original_text:
They come from a distant land,
    from the end of the heavens,
the Lord and the weapons of his indignation,
    to destroy the whole land.
korean_text: 무리가 먼 나라에서, 하늘 끝에서 왔음이여 곧 여호와와 그의 진노의 병기라 온 땅을 멸하려 함이로다

sentences.original_text: They come from a distant land,
from the end of the heavens,
the Lord and the weapons of his indignation,
